inclusion.criterion: Unresectable HCC with underlying Child's A/B cirrhosis
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Normal Main portal vein and its branches
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Less than 50% involvement of liver by HCC
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Unresectable HCC with underlying Child's C cirrhosis
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has unresectable HCC with underlying Child's A/B cirrhosis, normal main portal vein and its branches, and informed written consent. However, they have a history of UGIB in the last six months which may be an exclusion criterion.
